calendar.description: House Natural Resources, Agriculture, and Environment Hearing
Senate Natural Resources, Agriculture, and Environment Hearing

general_provisions: This bill addresses provisions related to water fluoridation and prescription fluoride supplements.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>defines terms;<hr><ltbullet>prohibits adding fluoride to public water systems;<hr><ltbullet> allows a pharmacist to prescribe fluoride; and<hr><ltbullet>directs the Division of Professional Licensing to establish guidelines for prescribing fluoride.
